vanish.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to disappear suddenly, especially in a way that cannot be easily explained
vanish.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: My keys were here a minute ago but now theyâ€™ve vanished.
She seemed to have just vanished into thin air (=suddenly disappeared in a very mysterious way).
The youngster vanished without a trace one day and has never been found.
vanish without (a) trace/vanish off the face of the earth
vanish.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Public support for the prime minister has now vanished.
By the 1930s, the wolf had vanished from the American West.
